description: This was a 5 day trip we took in May 2009.  Because it was so early in the season a lot of trails were closed and we went on this loop.  One thing good about going early is there was only a few people on the trails so it seemed like we had the whole place to ourselves.  This was a difficult loop and racked up 50 miles in 5 days.
directions: Day 1:  Park at the Minnewanka parking lot and Hike to LM20Day 2:  LM20 to LM8 with a side hike up to Alymer Look OutDay 3:  LM8 to CR6Day 4:  CR6 to CR15Day 5:  CR15 back to the parking lot
title: Banff Minnewanka Loop
